title: Couldn connect to node? issue.
body:
The ethereum wallet is not properly starting and the issue shown in the picture is appearing.

```
Version: `0.9.3`
OS & Version: windows 8.1
Node version: `geth (dont know where to check that)
Number of blocks synchronized:  Cant enter into app to check.
```
I have attached screenshot of the error and I will submit the logs as well.

![untitled](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34161323/33483250-46f043c8-d69d-11e7-8722-28220b6d5e23.png)



[Ethereum Wallet.zip](https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/files/1521624/Ethereum.Wallet.zip)

Wonder if that error is happening on your machine because of an antivirus software or firewall.
Look and see if there are any on the machine that can be temporarily disabled then see if the error happens.

Relevant snippet from the logs: 
```
INFO [12-01|13:42:02] Starting peer-to-peer node               instance=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1db4ecdc/windows-amd64/go1.9
INFO [12-01|13:42:02] Allocated cache and file handles         database=C:\\Users\\Sergio\\AppData\\Roaming\\Ethereum\\geth\\chaindata cache=1024 handles=1024
WARN [12-01|13:42:03] Upgrading database to use lookup entries 
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 1 Homestead: 1150000 DAO: 1920000 DAOSupport: true EIP150: 2463000 EIP155: 2675000 EIP158: 2675000 Byzantium: 4370000 Engine: ethash}"
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Disk storage enabled for ethash caches   dir=C:\\Users\\Sergio\\AppData\\Roaming\\Ethereum\\geth\\ethash count=3
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Disk storage enabled for ethash DAGs     dir=C:\\Users\\Sergio\\AppData\\Ethash                          count=2
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Initialising Ethereum protocol           versions="[63 62]" network=1
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Loaded most recent local header          number=3588031 hash=66628a…44902d td=223416550536568379864
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Loaded most recent local full block      number=0       hash=d4e567…cb8fa3 td=17179869184
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Loaded most recent local fast block      number=3559032 hash=639a0f…921b17 td=214960970666481953273
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Loaded local transaction journal         transactions=0 dropped=0
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Upgrading chain index                    type=bloombits percentage=0
INFO [12-01|13:42:03] Starting P2P networking 
Exception 0xc0000005 0x1 0x8b620c4 0x180008910
PC=0x180008910
signal arrived during external code execution

syscall.Syscall(0x7ffa7bd7fc50, 0x2, 0x454, 0x2, 0x0, 0x1e0, 0xe474e0, 0x642464e50)
	C:/go/src/runtime/syscall_windows.go:163 +0x69
syscall.SetFileCompletionNotificationModes(0x454, 0x2, 0xf05f47, 0x4)
	C:/go/src/syscall/zsyscall_windows.go:1727 +0x6f
internal/poll.(*FD).Init(0xc04346ef00, 0xf05f47, 0x4, 0xfbe868, 0x454, 0x0, 0x0)
	C:/go/src/internal/poll/fd_windows.go:346 +0xf9
os.newFile(0x454, 0xc04410a880, 0x37, 0xf05f47, 0x4, 0x0)
	C:/go/src/os/file_windows.go:57 +0x138
os.openFile(0xc04410a880, 0x37, 0x41, 0xc0000001a4, 0x50c836, 0xc042465018, 0x2)
	C:/go/src/os/file_windows.go:98 +0xff
os.OpenFile(0xc04410a880, 0x37, 0x41, 0xc0000001a4, 0x37, 0x0, 0x0)
	C:/go/src/os/file_windows.go:159 +0x15e
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/storage.OpenFile(0xc042167200, 0x33, 0xc04201a000, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	C:/gopath/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/storage/file_storage.go:97 +0x446
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb.OpenFile(0xc042167200, 0x33, 0xc0424651a8, 0xc042024a80, 0xc042465150, 0x4882cb)
	C:/gopath/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/vendor/github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb/db.go:212 +0x5c
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/p2p/discover.newPersistentNodeDB(0xc042167200, 0x33, 0x4, 0x13c21e9a1cd253f3, 0x7a6726f5b9609e6e, 0x6173a49b146cc79, 0x721bcb09462f4c96, 0x91028436aedf0d2, 0x5b6d862e291aa415, 0xce24eac1bb7e6450, ...)
	C:/gopath/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/p2p/discover/database.go:94 +0x92
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/p2p/discover.newNodeDB(0xc042167200, 0x33, 0x4, 0x13c21e9a1cd253f3, 0x7a6726f5b9609e6e, 0x6173a49b146cc79, 0x721bcb09462f4c96, 0x91028436aedf0d2, 0x5b6d862e291aa415, 0xce24eac1bb7e6450, ...)
	C:/gopath/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/p2p/discover/database.go:73 +0xcc
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/p2p/discover.newTable(0x15d83e0, 0xc0437f8380, 0x13c21e9a1cd253f3, 0x7a6726f5b9609e6e, 0x6173a49b146cc79, 0x721bcb09462f4c96, 0x91028436aedf0d2, 0x5b6d862e291aa415, 0xce24eac1bb7e6450, 0x79c2f2cdbe08802f, ...)
```

Same thing seems to have happened during every execution

Maybe related: 
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/2568167/setfilecompletionnotificationmodes-api-causes-an-i-o-completion-port-n
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/syscall/zsyscall_windows.go#L1745

... but I can't really make head or tails of that windows-advisory...
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
